concept-wr.title: Horizon Web Administration Interface
concept-wr.shortdesc: The Titanium Server Horizon web administration interface on any Regionâ€™s Controller provides menu access to both the Primary and Secondary Regions.

conbody.p: On Titanium Server-Primary Horizon, you can select from the Region menu, which lists all Secondary regions.
Switching regions changes the set of endpoints that the Horizon web administration interface uses to communicate with.
Any Titanium Server Horizon deployment in the cloud can control any Titanium Server or pristine Openstack region.

note.p: Users are redirected to the home page if they are on a Titanium Server specific panel during a switch to a pristine Openstack Cloud.

conbody.p: In a Titanium Server-Primary to Titanium Server-Secondary configuration, Horizon will still be started in both the Primary and Secondary regions. This means that:

li.p: users can access Titanium Server-Primary Horizon via http://tis_primary_ip_address
users can access Titanium Server-Secondary Horizon via http://tis_secondary_ip_address
